pre_caption: The scene is captured in a static, high-angle full shot, showing a person standing in the foreground, slightly left of center, on a low circular platform. In the background, positioned at the top of the frame, the lower halves of other figures are visible near equipment on a higher, more distant platform, establishing depth in the all-white space. A brief, intense white flash interrupts the scene, after which a figure who was standing in the foreground is no longer present, leaving a white, hose-like apparatus resting on a circular platform.**
